scripts.say: Port - Hallway
I've always thought about this, but... I'd love for an "incident" to occur on one of my patrols.
Don't you think so too, Commander? For example...
Ajax entwined her arm around mine.
I felt a soft but slightly firm sensation pressing against my skin.
Hm? The person over there is...
Ajax...
Oh, if it isn't Spee. Are you taking a walk by your lonesome?
In poor taste, as always. ... I feel bad for the Commander.
I wonder. To me, it doesn't seem like the Commander is bothered at all, isn't that right? Could it be that actually, you want to do something like this as well, Spee?
Not really... Unlike you, I don't have any interest in teasing the Commander. If I did so, I would sully the name of the Iron Blood.
You're suuure telling me, even though you've already lost once. Or, could it be that looking at this little piggy has made you feel jealous?
The feeling of a heated rivalry between them... was nonexistent.
... Sigh... Never mind what just happened. The restaurant we went to last time was pretty good. Will you take me there again some time?
Sure thing~ I really like that place too. Well, since that store has a strict "No Pets" policy... our little piggy won't be able to go~â™ª
Is that so... Also, regarding the outfit you gave me the other day... when Hipper saw it, she got really mad at me for some reason... I wonder if it's fine...
It's perfectly fine. Because those sweaters are especially effective against virgins, it will raise your battle power considerably more than it would otherwise seem.
I-I guess so... Thanks, Ajax.
Hehe~ I guess I'll have to ask Oklahoma for more good restaurant recommendations...
Before I knew it, Ajax had left me behind, all alone.
